LanguageData.Ammo_HarpoonArrow.label: Harpoon arrow
LanguageData.Ammo_TrashBomb.label: Trash bomb
LanguageData.Ammo_TrashBomb.description: A large ball with a powerful magnet inside and surrounded by all sorts of rubbish. If you deactivate the magnet, then the fragments fly apart in all directions, making holes all around.
